pages.text: Before you can melt ores, you will need something to power the foundry, which is coal. But there is an alternative if you don't like mining a lot.
pages.title: Charcoal is Your Friend

pages.text: You will need to light things on fire, but you can't craft a flint and steel... Luckily, you can craft the firebow. To use it, hold right click while holding it in your hand, aim at the block where you want fire, and wait until it lights the block.
pages.title: Firebow

pages.text: Now what would you light on fire? How about this handy pile of logs? Upon being lit on fire, it will quickly burn. However, if the log pile is completely covered by blocks soon after being set ablaze, after a few minutes it will turn into charcoal.
pages.title: Wood Log Pile
